headline: Benchmarking Edge Network Performance: Akamai, Cloudflare, Amazon CloudFront, Fastly, and Google
keywords: Speed Week, Speed, Performance, Measurement, TTFB, Network Performance Update, Speed & Reliability
description: We recently ran a measurement experiment where we used Real User Measurement (RUM) data from the standard browser API to test the performance of Cloudflare and others in real-world conditions across the globe.
